AboutMe

Full Stack Java-Developer

As a Java Developer with proficiency in Core Java, Advanced Java, and Frameworks, you possess a comprehensive skill set that enables you to design, develop, and deploy robust Java-based applications. Your expertise extends beyond the fundamentals of Core Java to encompass advanced concepts, such as database connectivity, multi-threading, networking, and web development. Additionally, your familiarity with popular Java frameworks empowers you to leverage pre-built components and streamline the development process, contributing to the efficiency and scalability of software projects. Proficiency in Core Java concepts, including object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms. Experience with Advanced Java technologies such as JDBC, Servlets, JSP, JavaBeans, and XML parsing. Familiarity with Java frameworks such as Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Java EE, or similar. Knowledge of database concepts and experience with SQL, JDBC.
